title: Amazon Seller Central - Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We’re hiring a proactive and knowledgeable Amazon Seller Virtual Assistant to help streamline our operations and drive sales growth. This role involves managing listings, inventory, orders, customer service, and basic marketing support.

Key Responsibilities:

Product Listings: Optimize product pages with compelling copy, keyword research, and high-quality images to boost visibility and sales.

Inventory Management: Monitor stock levels, coordinate with suppliers for restocking, and prevent stockouts or overstock.

Order Management: Track and process orders, ensure on-time fulfillment, and handle related customer inquiries.

Customer Service: Respond to customer questions, manage returns and refunds, and maintain excellent service ratings.

Marketing Support: Assist with Amazon PPC campaigns, manage social media for product visibility, and review sales data for improvements.

Requirements:

Must be proactive, detail-oriented, and reliable

Experience with Amazon Seller Central and related tools

Strong English communication and writing skills

Highly organized with excellent time management

Familiar with FBA, keyword research, and competitor analysis

Ability to work independently and within a team

Must be available 8AM–4PM CT (Central Time)

Must use a time tracker while working
